trans-unit.source: Defines the delegate for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Definiuje obiekt delegowany dla <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"> </xref> zdarzenie <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> klasy.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.

You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: Dostęp można uzyskać <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>zdarzenie <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>klasy w pliku Global.asax aplikacji platformy ASP.NET, jak pokazano w przykładzie dla tego tematu.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: You can use the RoleManagerEventHandler to replace the creation of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> with your own custom object.
trans-unit.target: Można zastąpić tworzenia RoleManagerEventHandler <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>obiekt przez <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>z niestandardowego obiektu.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: To do this, define a delegate using the RoleManagerEventHandler and assign it to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: W tym celu należy zdefiniować delegata za pomocą RoleManagerEventHandler i przypisz je do <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>zdarzeń <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>
